The video clip from Aaj Tak: s debate show Dangal showing Sambit Patra making the claim.
Testimony from Ujjwal Nikam: the public prosecutor of the 26/11 trial, admitting that he fabricated the story about Ajmal Kasab being fed biryani.
A 2012 report mentioning Nikam: s statement about Kasab inquiring about Raksha Bandhan and demanding mutton biryani in jail.
